lead_paragraph: Tennis pro Tommy Haas was hired Friday as tournament director of the BNP Paribas Open, replacing Raymond Moore, who quit in March after making controversial comments about female players.

headline.print_headline: Pro Tommy Haas Hired as Tourney Director at Indian Wells
headline.main: Pro Tommy Haas Hired as Tourney Director at Indian Wells
